name: Dungeon of Slime
description:
Controls (Keyboard):

Move - W, A, S, D

Aim - Mouse

Attack - Left Click

Close the game - Escape


Controls (PS4 Game-pad):

Move - Left Thumb Stick

Aim - Right Thumb Stick

Attack - Right Bumper
